entity.name: Condition_assertion
entity.description: The cumulative result of evaluating all the criteria involved in the condition, in the context of a subject target. The result is derived following the rules of evaluating the logical expressions of a compound criteria.

explicit.name: conclusion
explicit.description: The final logical value of the evaluated condition.

entity.name: Criterion_evaluated
entity.description: The evaluation record of each criterion element invovled in a condition.

explicit.name: result
explicit.description:
The result of a criterion evaluation.
Note: The value of the criterion parameter involved may come from a monitoring device, such as a thermometer. The actual value of the parmeter reading might not be recorded anywhere.
